securityCodeReviewMaster.name: Security Code Review Ninja
securityCodeReviewMaster.description: Code review is, hopefully, part of regular development practices for any organization. Adding security elements to code review is the most effective measure in preventing vulnerabilities, even before the first commit.

blackBelt.name: Black Belt
blackBelt.description: This module is based on the SANS Top 25 - Most Dangerous Software Flaws. Lessons are entry level difficulty aimed at introducing the concepts of vulnerability, exploit and software defense.

secondDegreeBlackBelt.name: Second Degree Black Belt
secondDegreeBlackBelt.description: Have some fun with this Capture the Flag module which is based on OWASP Top 10 (v2017). Your goal is to take down the cloud applications used in a worldwide malware campaign.

redTeam.name: Red Team
redTeam.description: Learn about scanning, exploitation and persistance. Leverage vulnerabilities found in a cloud container application and perform lateral movement to cloud account resources.

blueTeam.name: Blue Team
blueTeam.summary: Security controls and security engineering techniques
blueTeam.description: Apply security controls to defend against common vulnerabilities and identify sensitive data in production applications.
